title: Fees
rawQuery:
WITH daily_revenue AS (
    SELECT 
        date_trunc('day', evt_block_time) as date,
        _token as token,
        SUM(CAST(_amt AS DOUBLE) / 1e18) as daily_amount
    FROM infrared_berachain.infrared_evt_protocolfees
    GROUP BY 1, 2
)
SELECT 
    dr.date,
    p.symbol,
    dr.daily_amount as amount,
    dr.daily_amount * CAST(p.price AS DOUBLE) as amount_usd,
    SUM(dr.daily_amount * CAST(p.price AS DOUBLE)) OVER (
        ORDER BY dr.date 
        ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING
    ) as cumulative_amount_usd
FROM daily_revenue dr
INNER JOIN prices.day p 
    ON dr.token = p.contract_address 
    AND dr.date = p.timestamp 
WHERE p.contract_address IN (
    0x6969696969696969696969696969696969696969,
    0xac03caba51e17c86c921e1f6cbfbdc91f8bb2e6b,
    0x9b6761bf2397bb5a6624a856cc84a3a14dcd3fe5,
    0xfcbd14dc51f0a4d49d5e53c2e0950e0bc26d0dce
)
ORDER BY 1 desc, 2;

    SELECT 
        date_trunc('day', evt_block_time) as date,
        _token as token,
        SUM(CAST(_amt AS DOUBLE) / 1e18) as daily_amount

    SUM(dr.daily_amount * CAST(p.price AS DOUBLE)) OVER (

    ) as cumulative_amount_usd
FROM daily_revenue dr
INNER JOIN prices.day p 
    ON dr.token = p.contract_address 
    AND dr.date = p.timestamp

analysisResult.summary: 이 SQL 쿼리는 블록체인 데이터를 분석하는 쿼리입니다.
